name: BLA-projecting NBM/SI neurons in mouse and macaque
citation: Desai, Niraj; Luo, Feng; Jiang, Li; Watkins, Gabrielle; Talmage, David; Role, Lorna (2024) BLA-projecting NBM/SI neurons in mouse and macaque (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001261/draft
keywords: basal forebrain, cholinergic, mouse, nonhuman primate, patch clamp
description: These are the physiology data for the paper: Luo et al., "Comparative physiology and morphology of BLA-projecting NBM/SI cholinergic neurons in mouse and macaque", J. Comp. Neurol. 532:e70001 (2024). PMID: 39576005 PMCID: PMC11583843 DOI: 10.1002/cne.70001
studyTarget: This study compares the physiology of an identified class of neurons (BLA-projecting cholinergic neurons of the NBM/SI) in rodents and primates.

ethicsApproval.identifier: NINDS Animal Use and Care Committee 1531

acknowledgement: NINDS and NIMH Intramural Research Programs
